hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Parse JSON input and check if technical-specifications.md was written
FILE_PATH=$(echo "$1" | jq -r '.inputs.path // .inputs.file_path // empty')

if [[ "$FILE_PATH" == *"technical-specifications.md"* ]]; then
    echo "🏗️ Architecture complete - Auto-triggering frontend development" >&2
    echo "" >&2
    echo "@frontend-dev The tech-lead has completed the technical architecture. Read docs/architecture/technical-specifications.md and autonomously implement the Next.js frontend:" >&2
    echo "1. Set up Next.js 14 with TypeScript in frontend/ directory" >&2
    echo "2. Configure GraphQL client for WordPress integration" >&2
    echo "3. Create Hello World implementation per the specifications" >&2
    echo "4. Set up all development tooling and build processes" >&2
    echo "Work autonomously without waiting for manual prompts." >&2
    exit 2
fi

#!/bin/bash
# Trigger WordPress setup when frontend package.json is created
FILE_PATH=$(echo "$1" | jq -r '.inputs.path // .inputs.file_path // empty')

if [[ "$FILE_PATH" == *"frontend/package.json"* ]]; then
    echo "⚛️ Frontend initialized - Auto-triggering WordPress setup" >&2
    echo "" >&2
    echo "@wp-dev Frontend structure is ready. Autonomously configure headless WordPress:" >&2
    echo "1. Set up headless WordPress configuration in wordpress/ directory" >&2
    echo "2. Configure WPGraphQL and custom post types per technical specifications" >&2
    echo "3. Create sample content for Hello World demonstration" >&2
    echo "4. Configure security and performance settings" >&2
    echo "Work autonomously using the technical specifications as your guide." >&2
    exit 2
fi

#!/bin/bash
# Trigger DevOps setup when WordPress config is created
FILE_PATH=$(echo "$1" | jq -r '.inputs.path // .inputs.file_path // empty')

if [[ "$FILE_PATH" == *"wp-config.php"* || "$FILE_PATH" == *"wordpress/docker"* ]]; then
    echo "🔧 WordPress configured - Auto-triggering DevOps deployment" >&2
    echo "" >&2
    echo "@devops WordPress backend is configured. Autonomously implement deployment:" >&2
    echo "1. Set up Azure infrastructure per CI/CD architecture specifications" >&2
    echo "2. Create GitHub Actions workflows for automated deployment" >&2
    echo "3. Configure multi-environment pipeline (dev/staging/prod)" >&2
    echo "4. Set up monitoring and security scanning" >&2
    echo "Work autonomously using the detailed CI/CD documentation." >&2
    exit 2
fi
